#labels Featured
Command line options has been added with the application.

= Introduction =
Pingguin from now on will work with command line options. Here's a command line usage example,

pinggui /ip 192.168.16.1 /pd 174.136.48.107 /sd 4.2.2.2

N.B, /t switch enables notification

= Details =
1. Still not implemented if other strings are not provided those ip addresses will be set to 0.0.0.0
